thread.title: Zombasite gets update to version 0.901 through Early Access
thread.title_full: Zombasite gets update to version 0.901 through Early Access

author: News Zombie
title: Zombasite gets update to version 0.901 through Early Access
text:
Posted on October 16, 2015 in PC News 
Zombasite has received its first patch, 0.901, less than a week after launching through Steam Early Access. The dynamic, open-world action RPG has received over 30 fixes and tweaks. Some of the issues addressed include skills points now being free to allocate, non-playable characters no longer running away, and adjustments to text and menus. The update can be downloaded here , while the full list of changes can be found here . 
Zombasite is available through Steam Early Access for Linux, Mac, and Windows PC. 
– 
Some of the addressed issues: 
• added skills screen key to configure input screen (Castruccio/ScrObot) •made jewel, ring, and bag vendors more likely to be carrying their specific items (Crisses) •made cape vendors more likely to be carrying their specific items (Tyakraman) •doubled rotate speed on new character and bestiary screens (dragonfyre13) • can no longer pay money to search for Arch-Nemesis when they are not in the area (Zengrath) • bulletin boards can no longer be assassins (dragonfyre13) • added switch weapon/shield key to configure input screen (ScrObot) • hanged “Num Clans” to “Number of Clans (ScrObot) • fixed MainKeyError • fixed wording in inventory help topic (ScrObot) • fixed wording in basics help topic (ScrObot) • moved relation screen relationship/treaties stuff around a little to fit better (ScrObot)
